refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the audio spout frame (if active), otherwise it returns zero.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: This opcode can be used for monitoring the output signal from csound. It should not be used for processing the signal further.
See the entry for the fout opcode for an example of usage of monitor.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
